xwikidoc.title: Barand of Fortunato
xwikidoc.content: Known by the title Baron of Fortunado, Barand is considered to be an acknowledged bastard of the last King of Gilduin, Syvn XIV. He currently holds Prince Kieman Durhand in secret. His followers are worshippers of Nomok, the God of War.
